attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having had experience with a relitive in a ward for the elderly with dementia and nurses trying to cope non stop with patient needs it is plain to see more nurses are needed to care for patients. Please instead of laying nurses off when they have been trained employ them where they are needed.

rejection.details: you need to create a title for your petition - not your name
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
